name: Vectornator Drawing
summary: A VECTORNATOR file is a drawing created by Linearity Vectornator, a vector graphic designing application. It stores an artboard with one or more layers and may include text, shapes, and pen and brush strokes. VECTORNATOR files also contain drawing metadata , such as artboard dimensions and image resolution.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
